mapper.select: SELECT STOREROOM_ID FROM p_storeroom_put WHERE FIND_IN_SET(PUT_ID, #{StoreroomPutIds})

SELECT s.*, s2.AMOUNT AS storeroomCount FROM cy_storeroom AS s LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_put AS sp ON (s.ID = sp.STOREROOM_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS s2 ON (s.PARENT_ID = s2.ID) WHERE sp.PUT_ID = #{StoreroomPutId}

SELECT LEFT(td.VALUEE,2) AS item,SUM(cspo.MONEY) AS money FROM cy_storeroom_put_out AS cspo LEFT JOIN t_dict AS td ON td.TABLE_NAME='cy_storeroom' AND td.FIELD_NAME='TYPE_APPLICATION' AND td.KEYY=cspo.TYPE_APPLICATION WHERE cspo.IS_PUT='1' AND DATE_FORMAT(cspo.DATE,'%Y-%m')=#{date} GROUP BY cspo.TYPE_APPLICATION
